channel.title: Whiskies on Alpha Whisky Fund
channel.description: Recent content in Whiskies on Alpha Whisky Fund

item.title: Bushmills 10 Year Old
item.description: The benchmark Irish single malt, this has a far greater depth of flavour than standard Irish blends. A former winner of Best Irish Single Malt Whiskey in the World at the World Whiskies Awards.

item.title: Laphroaig Single Malt Whisky
item.description: Laphroaig – pronounced La-froyg – is one of the most divisive Scotch whiskies, loved by those who enjoy its medicinal, smoky flavour and looked on in amazement by those who don’t, it remains one of the most popular. Laphroaig distillery sits on the south coast of Islay, the first of the three Kildalton distilleries.
